EmailTemplate.name: Expiration 45 Day Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: 45 Day Notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Trade_Licensing__c.Vendor__c}
A current review of your {!Trade_Licensing__c.Name} shows {!Trade_Licensing__c.License_Number__c} will expire on {!Trade_Licensing__c.Expiration_Date__c}.
Please forward a current copy of your {!Trade_Licensing__c.License_Number__c} no later than {!Trade_Licensing__c.Expiration_Date__c}.
Should you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Thank you in advance for prompt attention to this matter.
Sincerely,
{!Trade_Licensing__c.Owner_Name__c}
